name: Pinball Panic - Be the Ball
description:
Note: Pinball Panic - Be the Ball was developed in approximately 16 hours per participant over one week as part of Akupara Games' internal game jam for 2021.

A modern take on your mother's pinball experience, centered with YOU, the player... AS THE BALL. You read that right.

Grapple around this 90s inspired indoor laser-tag aesthetic arena, rich with color and bursting at the seams with nostalgia. Enjoy the view while avoiding turret fire, meowing enemies, bouncing between ramps and bumpers, all while maintaining what people want from their pinball experience... racking up that juicy high score

Features:

  • Grapple yourself into bumpers, defeat enemies and rack up your high score
  • Classic pinball sound effects that are guaranteed* to release serotonin upon playing
  • 90s laser-tag inspired aesthetic (with matching arcade carpet, to boot)
  • When will you ever get to be a pinball again? Seriously, play this game

*Definitely not guaranteed but there's a good chance
